member.name: T:ReconstructionNative.fittwall
member.summary:
The fittwall class provides a CLS compliant, Object (native) interface to the MATLAB functions contained in the files:
D:\Scan-to-BIM repository\Reconstruction\Source\G_fitwall.m
member.remarks: @Version 4.0

member.name: M:ReconstructionNative.fittwall.G_fitwall(System.Int32,System.Object[]@,System.Object[],System.Object[])
member.summary: Provides an interface for the G_fitwall function in which the input and output arguments are specified as an array of Objects.
member.remarks: This method will allocate and return by reference the output argument array. M-Documentation: #function distance2curve,F_Linefit_TLS, F_Linefit_RANSAC2, F_Arcfit_TLS, F_Arcfit_RANSAC, F_Polyfit_RANSAC2, F_Polyfit_RANSAC3
member.param: The number of output arguments to return
Array of Object representing variable input arguments

member.name: M:ReconstructionNative.fittwall.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
